Wow first of all dont swear on here and wind your neck in!

Now I have to a=
dmit I didnt mean you I was talking about Chris moon but hell im at work an=
d im trying to do 2 things at once.

I have been following this group for a=
 year and from the message i wrote this is the first time I got a reply. No=
w Frank I think you work is quality and I definately want to learn more abo=
ut your work and what you do. and if you could advise me of where I can see=
 a profile of yourself that would be great. but dont start with the abusive=
 crap towards me.

Lets keep it clean. Again I was talking about Moon. not =
you Frank, iv read my message over and i definately worded it wrong. Im jus=
t not a big fan of Chris Moon.

And the religious crap thing also wind your=
 neck in about that, that was a pretty crappy thing first of all im not rel=
igious it just causes war. second of all I want to know more about your wor=
k.



________________________________
From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengir=
l@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, 5 June, 2009 16:25:2=
8
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy of my final e-mail to Frank sump=
tion I will go no further!





=A0Arrogant!? Lets see,=A0I don't do shows,=
 I'm not on podcast every friggin' day proclaiming my expertness, I don't c=
harge money-for anything, I share all information and schematics, and I do =
not kiss anyone's ass, guess that must be so egotistical of me.=A0 Arrogant=
!?, who is=A0the f--- is the duffus out there with the high priest mentalit=
y?=A0 The really sad part is trhe brain dead dorks that follow these clowns=
. Haliday proclaimed himself box expert extraordinaire, and there's those s=
orry twits that eat up everyword. There are no box/paranormal experts, no o=
ne knows how this shit works. Go to church if you want a religious experien=
ce!

=A0Anyway, there is one advantage to using tape, the entities seem cap=
able of changing the messages as needed. I can use the same recording over =
an over, and I swear, I get meaningful, having to do with the moment on eve=
ry listening. Brain matrixing--perhaps- -or does it really change? I can't =
tell. 

=A0Frank-S



=A0
On Fri, Jun 5, 2009 at 3:58 AM, eamonn mgherbi <e=
amonnmgherbi@ yahoo.co. uk> wrote:




Hi All

I have to admit that I share=
 the same opinion as Bruce. I dont what everyones take is on this but I fel=
t that some of moon and even Franks attitude was slightly arrogant. I am a =
researcher in the UK using old reel to reel methods and obtaining excellent=
 results. I lost some family and some close friends=A05 yeara ago=A0and sud=
denly it dawned on me...what is life all about. I went on to research every=
 evp pioneer i could, listen to hours/days of recordings and it changed my =
outlook on life. tears were turned to smiles and then I realised what all t=
his research is for. it was a big step for me spiritually. 

I dont know if=
 there is anyone else on here using old fashioned methods but if anybody wo=
uld like to hear recordings please ask. I am using a reel to reel sony "Hi =
frequency" recorder and trying various types of tones, backgrounds e.t.c.

=
Good luck to everyone with their research, you are right we are changing hi=
story we are discovering new things. if it wasnt for individuals such as ra=
udive, jurghenson to name a few, maybe we wouldnt have discovered this. it =
takes a brave individual to tackle an arrogant human race blunted with scie=
nce.

Kind Regards

The quiet one :-)




________________________________
=
From: "SnowfireL@aol. com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>
To: RTSC@yahoogroups. com; =
inside_the_box_ rtsc_talk_ radio@yahoogroup s.com; EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com=

Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy=
 of my final e-mail to Frank sumption I will go no further!





__________=
______________________
Limited Time Offers: Save big on popular laptops at =
Dell
Sorry to hear this Bruce, I=A0sure hope things get better, =A0I had no=
 idea there were so many problems when I joined all these lists, =A0I think=
 you are all great people, you folks together are making history don't you =
all realize this?=A0 There are so many people out there that have never hea=
rd of this type of communication, thousands out there!=A0 My friend just lo=
st her mother a couple of weeks ago, when I told her about the work you all=
 are doing, tears were replaced with a smile, she is looking forward to hea=
ring from her mom now too.=A0 Stop trying to hurt each other, it's not wort=
h it, life is too short for this stuff.=A0 You are all great people, May Go=
d Bless You All=A0~ And He Already Has,
sf

In a message dated 6/4/2009 2:2=
7:06 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, balllan94@yahoo. com writes:



guys,

Sor=
ry to burden you with this nonsense but this group and the RTSC group are m=
y only venues to respond to posts on other groups and have my account heard=
, I hope you do not mind to much.

Here is a copy of my final personal e-ma=
il to Frank Sumption which by the way is meant for him but he see's fit to =
post them publicly in an attempt to discredit me.

I want you to read it fi=
rst hand so there are no chance of it being altered before it is posted els=
e where.

I will not address Frank again
------------ --------- --------- -=
-------- --------- --------- -

Frank,

This is getting ridiculous now, you=
 should stop writing these posts, all you are doing is making yourself look=
 ridiculous.

I have offered many times to make my raw recordings available=
 for review by anyone who wants them. I have made the same challenge to you=
r friend moon who we all know is behind this tirade he has time and again r=
efused or ignored the request for any type of audio file
to be publicly pos=
ted for revue and continues to take advantage of innocent unsuspecting peop=
le with his con game and charging large amounts of money for sessions where=
 he fabricates and makes up content as he goes along.

I was the only one t=
o confront him in public and expose him for the fake he is and this is his =
feeble attempt at retaliation. I and other researchers like me have brought=
 this research light years from where it was when you and I first met, moon=
 just continues to use it to rip people off and has not contributed a thing=
 to the research of ghost box communication beside lining his own pockets. =


Just the fact that he has you doing his dirty work shows the type of guy =
he is. I can remember a time when you publicly came out against any type of=
 money making using your boxes and even refused moon when he wanted to manu=
facture and sell them for large profits yet now you condone his robbery of =
innocent unaware people and actually act foolish on his behest.

Frank you =
are better than this, just concentrate on developing a better box and forge=
t about moon and his tricks and lies, he is finished in the paranormal and =
he knows it, everyone is wise to his game and he is practically an outcast.=


Frank you are hitching you wagon to a dead horse. Get away from these bad=
 influences before they ruin your reputation as well.

We have had this moo=
n discussion in the past and once he has exhausted his need for you he will=
 screw you again like he has done so many times before.

Frank, I like and =
respect you and I hope you will consider what I have said in this e-mail an=
d I sincerely hope you post this one on the evp-itc group. I will be postin=
g it on my group and others I belong to.

Your former friend
Bruce







 =
